analyzed: katham ṭhitaḥ tvam aham aṭṭhitaḥ amhi
tasmai ṭhitā uham tuvam aṭṭhitā asi
id ca iva ca uraḥ asim āvudhan ca
tam ehi bhikkhu iti tadā avoca
esa iva tassa ahu bhikkhu bhāvaḥ
disā api me dhamma katham suṇantu
disā api me yuñjantu buddha sāsane
disā api me te manuje bhajantu

original: Na hi jātu so mamaṁ hiṁse,
analyzed: na hi jātu saḥ mamam hise
